category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TWP.AppearanceColors
preference.preference_description: Defines the colors to be shown for various elements in the Time Way Planner view of the Manufacturing Process Planner application. Valid Values: Object:object-name - Specifies the object whose appearance is customized. The value is Operation, Station, or ProductionZoneLine. BackgroundColor:RGB-code - Specifies the background color of the object specified in the Object parameter. For ProductionZoneLine, this is the boundary color. ConflictColor:RGB-code - Applicable to operations only, specifies the color when a conflict is detected, for example, overlapping operations, or operations starting at the same position. DuplicateColor:RGB-code - Applicable to operations only, specifies the color whenever an operation occurs in multiple execution positions. ExceedingColor:RGB-code - Applicable to operations only, specifies the color whenever an operation exceeds the cycle time of station. ForegroundColor:RGB-code - Applicable to process zone and line boundaries only (ProductionZoneLine), specifies the color for text.
